messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: And our sponsor today is Tracking beacons, don't want to get boned by clown? Use the Tracking beacons!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.
